roles.title: Salim remained unequivocal in his requests
quotes: To ensure a sense of African agency when it came to material and financial contributions, as well as the urgent need to support the OAU’s liberation fund, Salim remained unequivocal in his requests that all material and financial contributions be channelled through the OAU Liberation Committee or directly to the liberation movements themselves.
